originContent: # Raptor
translatedContent: <translate-content># 猛禽

originContent: Based on the reverse-engineered codebase from Raptor Call Of The Shadows by nukeykt
translatedContent: 基于 nukeykt 逆向工程的《猛禽：阴影之战》代码库

originContent: ## Media
translatedContent: ## 媒体

originContent: Click on the thumbnail to watch some videos showing the project in action
translatedContent: 点击缩略图观看展示项目运行的视频

originContent: [![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://img.youtube.com/vi/Nt2HfchiudY/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCedmTTlonJK5DvkiMpA_teQ)
translatedContent: [![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://img.youtube.com/vi/Nt2HfchiudY/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCedmTTlonJK5DvkiMpA_teQ)

originContent: ## Information
translatedContent: ## 信息

originContent: Original Raptor Call Of The Shadows author Scott Host is working on a new modernized version of the classic called Raptor Remixed. If you are a Raptor fan it would be cool if you would support the project on Kickstarter. For more information visit [www.mking.com](https://www.mking.com)
translatedContent: 原《猛禽：阴影之战》作者 Scott Host 正在开发经典游戏的现代化新版本，名为《猛禽重制》。如果你是猛禽粉丝，支持该项目的 Kickstarter 会很酷。更多信息请访问 [www.mking.com](https://www.mking.com)

originContent: ## Quick start
translatedContent: ## 快速开始

originContent: Release builds are available for Windows and macOS.
translatedContent: 发布版本可用于 Windows 和 macOS。

originContent: All release builds contain only the assets (GLB files) of the shareware version 1.2.
translatedContent: 所有发布版本仅包含共享版 1.2 的资源（GLB 文件）。

originContent: If you want to play the full version you have to get the assets (GLB files) of the full version 1.2 yourself and copy them to the installation directory.
translatedContent: 如果想玩完整版，必须自行获取完整版 1.2 的资源（GLB 文件）并复制到安装目录。

originContent: To download the latest release build for your platform, click [Download](https://github.com/skynettx/raptor/releases/latest).
translatedContent: 要下载适用于您平台的最新发布版本，请点击 [下载](https://github.com/skynettx/raptor/releases/latest)。

originContent: Then install the downloaded release build on your system by following the instructions of the installer.
translatedContent: 然后按照安装程序的说明在系统上安装下载的发布版本。

originContent: That's it now Raptor is ready to play.
translatedContent: 就这样，猛禽现在可以玩了。

originContent: For those who want to build themselves or who want more configuration information, continue below otherwise you're done here.
translatedContent: 想自行构建或需要更多配置信息的，请继续往下，否则您已完成。

originContent: ## Installing
translatedContent: ## 安装

originContent: You need the original assets (GLB files) from Raptor Call Of The Shadows v1.2 shareware or full version.
translatedContent: 您需要《猛禽：阴影之战》v1.2 共享版或完整版的原始资源（GLB 文件）。

originContent: Important only the DOS version v1.2 is compatible! You have to take care of these files yourself.
translatedContent: 重要提示，仅支持 DOS 版本 v1.2！您必须自行获取这些文件。

originContent: The assets can be loaded from the current working directory (Raptor directory) or from the external system specific directory.
translatedContent: 资源可以从当前工作目录（猛禽目录）或外部系统特定目录加载。

originContent: **Please note that the release build version 0.8.0 does not support the external system specific directory and manages all assets, config and save files in the current working directory.**
translatedContent: **请注意，发布版本 0.8.0 不支持外部系统特定目录，所有资源、配置和存档文件均管理于当前工作目录。**

originContent: The external system specific directories are the following:
translatedContent: 外部系统特定目录如下：</translate-content>

originContent: Windows: Users\Username\AppData\Roaming\Raptor\
translatedContent: Windows: Users\Username\AppData\Roaming\Raptor\

originContent: Linux: ~/.local/share/Raptor/
translatedContent: Linux: ~/.local/share/Raptor/

originContent: macOS: ~/Library/Application Support/Raptor/
translatedContent: macOS: ~/Library/Application Support/Raptor/

originContent: The config file `SETUP.INI` and the save files are also loaded and saved in these folders.
translatedContent: 配置文件 `SETUP.INI` 和存档文件也会在这些文件夹中加载和保存。

originContent: On other systems that are not officially supported, the Raptor directory is used for loading and saving the config file and the save files.
translatedContent: 在其他非官方支持的系统上，Raptor 目录用于加载和保存配置文件和存档文件。

originContent: Copy the `raptor.exe` (Windows) or `raptor` (Linux or macOS) from build directory to Raptor directory.
translatedContent: 将构建目录中的 `raptor.exe`（Windows）或 `raptor`（Linux 或 macOS）复制到 Raptor 目录。

originContent: For MIDI support over TinySoundFont copy the soundfont `TimGM6mb.sf2` from `include\TimGM6mb\` to Raptor directory.
translatedContent: 为了通过 TinySoundFont 支持 MIDI，将音色库 `TimGM6mb.sf2` 从 `include\TimGM6mb\` 复制到 Raptor 目录。

originContent: Under Windows copy the file `SDL.dll` from `include\SDL2-devel-2.28.2-VC\SDL2-2.28.2\lib\x86\` for 32 bit installation or for 64 bit installation from
translatedContent: 在 Windows 下，将文件 `SDL.dll` 从 `include\SDL2-devel-2.28.2-VC\SDL2-2.28.2\lib\x86\`（32 位安装）或

originContent: `include\SDL2-devel-2.28.2-VC\SDL2-2.28.2\lib\x64\` to Raptor directory.
translatedContent: `include\SDL2-devel-2.28.2-VC\SDL2-2.28.2\lib\x64\`（64 位安装）复制到 Raptor 目录。

originContent: Under Linux install lib-sdl2 from the packagemanager of your respective distro. When you use macOS install lib-sdl2 from dmg or from a packagemanager like brew etc.
translatedContent: 在 Linux 下，从相应发行版的软件包管理器安装 lib-sdl2。使用 macOS 时，从 dmg 或通过 brew 等包管理器安装 lib-sdl2。

originContent: ### Shareware
translatedContent: ### 共享软件

originContent: Copy the following files to Raptor or external system specific directory:
translatedContent: 将以下文件复制到 Raptor 或外部系统特定目录：

originContent: FILE0000.GLB
translatedContent: FILE0000.GLB

originContent: FILE0001.GLB
translatedContent: FILE0001.GLB

originContent: ### Full version
translatedContent: ### 完整版本

originContent: Copy the following files to Raptor or external system specific directory:
translatedContent: 将以下文件复制到Raptor或外部系统特定目录：

originContent: FILE0000.GLB
translatedContent: FILE0000.GLB

originContent: FILE0001.GLB
translatedContent: FILE0001.GLB

originContent: FILE0002.GLB
translatedContent: FILE0002.GLB

originContent: FILE0003.GLB
translatedContent: FILE0003.GLB

originContent: FILE0004.GLB
translatedContent: FILE0004.GLB

originContent: ### Configuration
translatedContent: ### 配置

originContent: You can build or download [Raptor Setup](https://github.com/skynettx/raptorsetup.git) to create and edit the
translatedContent: 您可以构建或下载 [Raptor Setup](https://github.com/skynettx/raptorsetup.git) 来创建和编辑

originContent: `SETUP.INI`, or edit it manually as follows.
translatedContent: `SETUP.INI`，或者按如下方式手动编辑。

originContent: Copy the `SETUP(ADLIB).INI` or the `SETUP(MIDI).INI` file from build directory to external system specific directory (Windows, Linux and macOS) or Raptor directory (only systems that are not officially supported) and rename it to `SETUP.INI`.
translatedContent: 将构建目录中的 `SETUP(ADLIB).INI` 或 `SETUP(MIDI).INI` 文件复制到外部系统特定目录（Windows、Linux 和 macOS）或 Raptor 目录（仅限非官方支持的系统），并重命名为 `SETUP.INI`。

originContent: If you want MIDI over the TinySoundFont lib rename the `TimGM6mb.sf2` to `SoundFont.sf2` or specify the filename in the `SETUP.INI` file:
translatedContent: 如果您想通过 TinySoundFont 库使用 MIDI，请将 `TimGM6mb.sf2` 重命名为 `SoundFont.sf2`，或在 `SETUP.INI` 文件中指定文件名：

originContent: `SoundFont=SoundFont.sf2`
translatedContent: `SoundFont=SoundFont.sf2`

originContent: You can use any other GM compatible soundfont in sf2 format. For a better MIDI sound quality I recommend the FluidR3_GM.sf2.
translatedContent: 您可以使用任何其他 GM 兼容的 sf2 格式 soundfont。为了更好的 MIDI 音质，我推荐 FluidR3_GM.sf2。

originContent: This font is 140 MB in size, so it is not in the repository.
translatedContent: 该字体大小为 140 MB，因此未包含在仓库中。

originContent: To play with one of the following input devices set `Control=0` under the [Setup] section in the `SETUP.INI` file to:
translatedContent: 要使用以下输入设备之一，请在 `SETUP.INI` 文件的 [Setup] 部分下设置 `Control=0`：

originContent: `Control=0` Keyboard
translatedContent: `Control=0` 键盘

originContent: `Control=1` Mouse
translatedContent: `Control=1` 鼠标

originContent: `Control=2` Joystick (Game Controller)
translatedContent: `Control=2` 操纵杆（游戏控制器）

originContent: Haptic (Game Controller rumble support) can be switched off or on under the [Setup] section in the `SETUP.INI` file:
translatedContent: 在 `SETUP.INI` 文件的 [Setup] 部分中，Haptic（游戏控制器震动支持）可以开启或关闭：

originContent: `Haptic=0`
translatedContent: `Haptic=0`

originContent: `Haptic=1`
translatedContent: `Haptic=1`

originContent: If you want to turn off the menu pointer control via the joystick in mode `Control=2` and enable the new joystick menu control in all
translatedContent: 如果您想关闭在 `Control=2` 模式下通过操纵杆的菜单指针控制，并在所有输入模式下启用新的操纵杆菜单控制，请在 `SETUP.INI` 文件的 [Setup] 部分设置：

originContent: input modes, set under the [Setup] section in the `SETUP.INI` file:
translatedContent: `joy_ipt_MenuNew=0`

originContent: `joy_ipt_MenuNew=0`
translatedContent: `joy_ipt_MenuNew=1`

originContent: `joy_ipt_MenuNew=1`
translatedContent: 系统 MIDI 支持（Windows 多媒体，Linux ALSA，macOS CoreAudio 和 macOS CoreMIDI）可以在 `SETUP.INI` 文件的 [Setup] 部分中开启或关闭：

originContent: System MIDI support (Windows Multimedia, Linux ALSA, macOS CoreAudio and macOS CoreMIDI) can be switched off or on in the [Setup] section in the `SETUP.INI` file:
translatedContent: `sys_midi=0`

originContent: `sys_midi=0`
translatedContent: `sys_midi=1`

originContent: `sys_midi=1`
translatedContent: 对于 Windows 多媒体，MIDI 设备在 `SETUP.INI` 文件的 [Setup] 部分下设置：

originContent: For Windows Multimedia under Windows, the MIDI device is set under the [Setup] section in `SETUP.INI` file:
translatedContent: `winmm_mpu_device=0`

originContent: `winmm_mpu_device=0`
translatedContent: Linux 下 ALSA MIDI 的客户端和端口，在 `SETUP.INI` 文件的 [Setup] 部分设置：

originContent: Client and port for ALSA MIDI under Linux, is set under the [Setup] section in the `SETUP.INI` file:
translatedContent: `alsa_output_client=128`

originContent: `alsa_output_client=128`
translatedContent: `alsa_output_port=0`

originContent: `alsa_output_port=0`
translatedContent: 要使用 ALSA MIDI 的软件合成器，例如安装您的发行版软件包管理器中的 timidity 和 soundfont-fluid。

originContent: To use a software synthesizer with ALSA MIDI, install for example timidity and soundfont-fluid from the packagemanager of your distro.
translatedContent: macOS 上使用软件合成器 DLS synth 的 CoreAudio 支持可以在 `SETUP.INI` 文件的 [Setup] 部分开启或关闭：

originContent: CoreAudio support on macOS with software synthesizer DLS synth can be switched off or on under the [Setup] section in the `SETUP.INI` file:
translatedContent: `core_dls_synth=0`

originContent: `core_dls_synth=0`
translatedContent: `core_dls_synth=1`

originContent: `core_dls_synth=1`
translatedContent: 如果您想在 macOS 上使用 CoreMIDI，必须在 `SETUP.INI` 文件中关闭 `core_dls_synth=0`。

originContent: If you want to use CoreMIDI under macOS, `core_dls_synth=0` must be switched off in the `SETUP.INI` file.
translatedContent: 您可以在 `SETUP.INI` 文件的 [Setup] 部分设置 CoreMIDI 端口如下：

originContent: You can set the CoreMIDI port under the [Setup] section in the `SETUP.INI` file as follows:
translatedContent: `core_midi_port=0`

originContent: `core_midi_port=0`
translatedContent: 要在全屏模式下游戏退出后显示文本模式结束画面，请在 `SETUP.INI` 文件的 [Video] 部分设置：

originContent: To display the text mode ending screen after the game quits in fullscreen mode set under the [Video] section in the `SETUP.INI` file:
translatedContent: `txt_fullscreen=0`

originContent: `txt_fullscreen=0`
translatedContent: `txt_fullscreen=1`

originContent: `txt_fullscreen=1`

translatedContent: ## 构建

originContent: ## Build
translatedContent: 该项目支持 msvc、gcc 和 clang 编译器。

originContent: The project supports the compilers msvc, gcc and clang.
translatedContent: 当您在系统上安装了 git 后，可以通过输入 `git clone https://github.com/skynettx/raptor.git` 克隆仓库。

originContent: When you have installed git on your system you can clone the repository by type in `git clone https://github.com/skynettx/raptor.git`.

translatedContent: ### Windows

originContent: ### Windows
translatedContent: 您可以使用位于 `msvc\` 的 Visual Studio 2022 项目文件，或位于 `gcc\` 的 CodeBlocks 项目文件。

originContent: You can use the projectfile for Visual Studio 2022 under `msvc\` or the projectfile for CodeBlocks under `gcc\`.

translatedContent: ### Linux

originContent: ### Linux
translatedContent: 请记得安装所需依赖 lib-sdl2。在某些发行版中，如 Debian 或 Ubuntu，有一个额外的 libsdl2-dev 软件包。

originContent: Please remember to install the required dependencies lib-sdl2. In some distros there is an extra libsdl2-dev package like Debian or Ubuntu.
translatedContent: 您可以使用位于 `gcc\` 的 CodeBlocks 项目文件。

originContent: You can use the projectfile for CodeBlocks under `gcc\`.
translatedContent: 否则，您可以使用 cmake。要使用 cmake，请在仓库根目录输入：

originContent: Otherwise you can use cmake. To use cmake type in the root of the repository:
mkdir build
translatedContent: mkdir build

originContent: cd build
translatedContent: cd build

originContent: cmake ..
translatedContent: cmake ..

originContent: make
translatedContent: make
### macOS

originContent: ### macOS
translatedContent: 安装所需的依赖项 lib-sdl2。要构建，请使用 cmake，在仓库根目录输入：

originContent: Install the required dependencies lib-sdl2. To build use cmake, type in the root of the repository:
mkdir build
translatedContent: mkdir build

originContent: cd build
translatedContent: cd build

originContent: cmake ..
translatedContent: cmake ..

originContent: make
translatedContent: make
## 常见问题解答

originContent: ## FAQ
translatedContent: 1. Linux下无音频：

originContent: 1. No audio under Linux:
translatedContent: 请确保从您的发行版的软件包管理器安装了所有必要的ALSA和/或PulseAudio依赖项。

originContent: Make sure you get all the necessary ALSA and or PulseAudio dependencies from the packagemanager of your distro.
translatedContent: 2. 我在哪里可以更改视频设置：

originContent: 2. Where can i change the video settings:
translatedContent: 视频设置可以在配置文件 `SETUP.INI` 中设置。要切换全屏模式，请在 [Video] 部分将 `fullscreen=0`

originContent: The video settings can be set in the config file `SETUP.INI`. To toggle fullscreen mode on edit under the [Video] section `fullscreen=0`
translatedContent: 编辑为 `fullscreen=1`。或关闭宽高比模式，将 `aspect_ratio_correct=1` 改为 `aspect_ratio_correct=0`。

originContent: to `fullscreen=1`. Or aspect ratio mode off `aspect_ratio_correct=1` to `aspect_ratio_correct=0`.

translatedContent: ## 致谢

originContent: ## Thanks
translatedContent: 特别感谢 [nukeykt](https://github.com/nukeykt) 和 [wel97459](https://github.com/wel97459) 对重构源码的卓越贡献。

originContent: Special thanks to [nukeykt](https://github.com/nukeykt) and [wel97459](https://github.com/wel97459) for their great work on the reconstructed source code.
translatedContent: 非常感谢 [Scott Host](https://www.mking.com) 的大力支持。

originContent: Big thanks to [Scott Host](https://www.mking.com) for his great support.
translatedContent: 还要感谢 [schellingb](https://github.com/schellingb) 提供的优秀 TinySoundFont 库，以及所有来自

originContent: Also many thanks to [schellingb](https://github.com/schellingb) for the great TinySoundFont library and to all contributors from the
translatedContent: [chocolate-doom 项目](https://github.com/chocolate-doom) 的贡献者，感谢他们出色的 libtextscreen。 此外，

originContent: [chocolate-doom project](https://github.com/chocolate-doom) for the awesome libtextscreen. Furthermore, many thanks to Tim Brechbill for the TimGM6mb
translatedContent: 非常感谢 Tim Brechbill 提供的 TimGM6mb 声音字体。

originContent: soundfont.
